A highly addictive puzzle game to wake up sleeping brains!

Zombie Blast : Puzzle Hexa is an immersive game that can be enjoyed by children and adults! Feel the electrifying excitement of clearing all the stages of Zombie Blast : Puzzle Hexa! A great casual game for killing time!

Every day obtain bonus gifts for free.

【Zombie Blast : Puzzle Hexa Features】
◈ An addictive game enjoyed by people all around the world!
◈ Over 1,000 special stage modes!
◈ Combo achievements with horizontal and diagonal line removal makes for exciting games!
◈ With low size, Zombie Blast : Puzzle Hexa can be downloaded anytime and anywhere
◈ Play anytime and anywhere without Wi-Fi!

【How to play Zombie Blast : Puzzle Hexa】
◈ Arrange the blocks of the same color into a straight line to destroy them.
◈ Fill the given blocks into a single large block.
